name: Not My Day!
description: Every person in life had a bad day, when in an instant everything went out of hand, this story will tell about one farmer, who had what usually happens only in films of a different format.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core, Recommended 2.8 GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 6870 / Nvidia geforce gtx 560 ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i5 4460 and AMD Ryzen 5 1600X Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: R9 280X / Nvidia geforce gtx 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
